Text.Title: Where
Text.HelpText: Returning only data that satisfies thecomma-separated set of Where conditions.

Text.Title: Having
Text.HelpText: Returning only data that satisfies thecomma-separated set of Having conditions.

RestConnector.Title: Ahrefs Rank
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the URLs and their rankings.

JsonPath.Title: Url
JsonPath.HelpText: Target of the request.

JsonPath.Title: Ahrefs Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: URL Rating of the target.

RestConnector.Title: Anchors
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the anchor text and the number of backlinks, referring pages and referring domains that has it.

JsonPath.Title: Anchor
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text used in at least one backlink from the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external backlinks found that are using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of pages found containing backlinks that are using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Refdomains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring domains that are using the anchor text when linking to the target.

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: Least recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink that is using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink that is using the anchor text.

RestConnector.Title: Anchors Ref Domains
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains connection between anchors and domains. Can be used to get all referring domains with specified anchor

JsonPath.Title: Anchors
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of different anchor texts that are used in backlinks to the target on the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external backlinks found that are using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domain
JsonPath.HelpText: Referring domain that contains at least one backlink using the anchor text.

RestConnector.Title: Backlinks
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the backlinks and details of the referring pages, such as anchor and page title.

JsonPath.Title: URL From
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the page where the backlink is found.

JsonPath.Title: URL To
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the page the backlink is pointing to.

JsonPath.Title: Ahrefs Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: URL Rating of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Domain Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: IP From
JsonPath.HelpText: IP address of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Links Internal
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal links found in the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Links External
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links found in the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: PageSize
JsonPath.HelpText: Size of the referring page, in bytes.

JsonPath.Title: Encoding
JsonPath.HelpText: Character encoding of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Title of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: Least recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Prev Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Second to the most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlink appears in all pages of a single website, such as in a footer or header.

JsonPath.Title: Original
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlink was present on the referring page when the Ahrefs crawler first visited it.

JsonPath.Title: Link Type
JsonPath.HelpText: Either href, redirect, frame, form, canonical, rss, alternate.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: For redirected links, the Redirect Code (3XX), zero otherwise.

JsonPath.Title: Nofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlink is NoFollow.

JsonPath.Title: Alt
JsonPath.HelpText: Alternative text of the image backlink, if exists.

JsonPath.Title: Anchor
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text of the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Text Pre
JsonPath.HelpText: Snippet before the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Text Post
JsonPath.HelpText: Snippet after the anchor text.

RestConnector.Title: Backlinks New/Lost
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the new or lost backlinks and details of the referring pages.

JsonPath.Title: Date
JsonPath.HelpText: Date the backlink was tagged as New or Lost.

JsonPath.Title: Type
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlink is New or Lost.

JsonPath.Title: URL From
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the page where the backlink is found.

JsonPath.Title: URL To
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the page the backlink is pointing to.

JsonPath.Title: Ahrefs Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: URL Rating of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Domain Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the referring domain

JsonPath.Title: Links Internal
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal links found in the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Links External
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links found in the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Encoding
JsonPath.HelpText: Character encoding of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Title of the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: Date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink for the first time.

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Prev Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Second to the most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates if backlinks appear in all pages of a single website, such as in a footer or header.

JsonPath.Title: Origin
JsonPath.HelpText: Either fresh, drop, or recrawl.

JsonPath.Title: Link Type
JsonPath.HelpText: Either href, redirect, frame, form, canonical, rss, alternate.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: For redirected links, the Redirect Code (3XX), zero otherwise.

JsonPath.Title: Nofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlink is NoFollow.

JsonPath.Title: Alt
JsonPath.HelpText: Alternative text of the image backlink, if exists.

JsonPath.Title: Anchor
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text of the backlink.

JsonPath.Title: Text Pre
JsonPath.HelpText: Snippet before the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Text Post
JsonPath.HelpText: Snippet after the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: HTTP Code
JsonPath.HelpText: HTTP code that was last returned for the referring page.

JsonPath.Title: Original
JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlinks was present on the referring page when the Ahrefs crawler first visited it.

RestConnector.Title: Backlinks New/Lost Counters
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains new and lost backlink totals.

JsonPath.Title: Date
JsonPath.HelpText: Date the backlink was tagged as New or Lost

JsonPath.Title: URL To
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the page the backlink is pointing to.

JsonPath.Title: New
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of new backlinks found on the referring pages.

JsonPath.Title: Lost
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of backlinks removed from the referring pages.

JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of new backlinks found on the referring pages.

JsonPath.Title: Lost Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of backlinks removed from the referring pages.

JsonPath.Title: Domain Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the target domain.

RestConnector.Title: Linked Anchors
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the anchor text and the number of outgoing links that have it.

JsonPath.Title: Links Internal
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal outgoing links found that are using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Links External
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external outgoing links found that are using the anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: Anchor
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text used in at least one outgoing link from the target domain.

RestConnector.Title: Linked Domains
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the external domains that the target has links to.

JsonPath.Title: Domain From
JsonPath.HelpText: Target of the request.

JsonPath.Title: Domain To
JsonPath.HelpText: External domain that has links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target that link to the external domain.

JsonPath.Title: Unique Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of unique pages from the target that link to the external domain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain To Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the external domain.

RestConnector.Title: Linked Domains by Type
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the external domains that the target has links to.

JsonPath.Title: Domain From
JsonPath.HelpText: Target of the request.

JsonPath.Title: Domain To
JsonPath.HelpText: Root of external domain that has links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target that link to the external domain.

JsonPath.Title: Text
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of text external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Image
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of image external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: NoFollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of NoFollow external links from the target

JsonPath.Title: DoFollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of DoFollow external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of redirection external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Canonical
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of canonical external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Gov
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target to governmental domain.

JsonPath.Title: Edu
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target to educational domain.

JsonPath.Title: RSS
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of RSS external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Alternate
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of alternate external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: FirstSeen
JsonPath.HelpText: Least recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to see the link on the target.

JsonPath.Title: LastVisited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to see the link on the target.

JsonPath.Title: Domain To Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the external domain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain To Ahrefs Top
JsonPath.HelpText: Ahrefs rank of the external domain.

RestConnector.HelpText: Aggregated statistics of each Type.

JsonPath.Title: Linked Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target that link to the external domain.

JsonPath.Title: Text
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of text external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Image
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of image external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: NoFollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of NoFollow external links from the target

JsonPath.Title: DoFollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of DoFollow external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of redirection external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Canonical

JsonPath.Title: Gov

JsonPath.Title: Edu
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links from the target to educational domain.

JsonPath.Title: RSS
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of RSS external links from the target.

JsonPath.Title: Alternate
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of alternate external links from the target.

RestConnector.Title: Metrics
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains metrics about the target, such as total number of backlinks, referring pages, etc

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external backlinks found on the referring pages that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external web pages containing at least one backlink that links to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of unique pages visited by the Ahrefs crawler on the target.

JsonPath.Title: Text
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks that use anchor texts.

JsonPath.Title: Image
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks that use image as an anchor.

JsonPath.Title: Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks that appear in all pages of a single external website, such as in a footer or header.

JsonPath.Title: Not Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks in one or several external pages, but not all or the majority of pages of a single website.

JsonPath.Title: Nofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of NoFollow backlinks that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Dofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of DoFollow backlinks that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of redirects found that forward to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Canonical
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of canonical backlinks that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Gov
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks of all types (including images and NoFollow) found on web pages on governmental domains that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Edu
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks of all types (including images and NoFollow) found on web pages on educational domains that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Html Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of HTML pages the target link has.

JsonPath.Title: Links Internal
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal links found in the target.

JsonPath.Title: Links External
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links found in the target.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of domains containing at least one backlink that links to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Class C
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring class C networks that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Refips
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of distinct IP addresses under a single network that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Linked Root Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal or external domains that are linked from the target.

RestConnector.Title: Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the crawled pages. The result is similar to the crawled pages report found in the raw data export in Site Explorer.

JsonPath.Title: URL
JsonPath.HelpText: URL of the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Ahrefs Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: URL Rating of the page.

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to crawl the page.

JsonPath.Title: Http Code
JsonPath.HelpText: HTTP code that was last returned for the page.

JsonPath.Title: Size
JsonPath.HelpText: Size of the crawled page, in bytes.

JsonPath.Title: Links Internal
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of internal links found in the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Links External
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external links found in the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Title of the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect URL
JsonPath.HelpText: URL where the page redirects to.

JsonPath.Title: Contenct Encoding
JsonPath.HelpText: Type of encoding used to compress the page data.

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of external backlinks found on the referring pages that link to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Dofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of DoFollow backlinks that link to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Nofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of NoFollow backlinks that link to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Redirects
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of pages found that redirect to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of domains containing at least one backlink that links to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Class C
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring class C networks that link to the crawled page.

JsonPath.Title: Refips
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of distinct IP addresses under a single network that link to the crawled page.

RestConnector.Title: Ref Domains
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the referring domains that contain backlinks to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domains
JsonPath.HelpText: The referring domain that contains at least one link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks found in the referring domain that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of referring pages found in the referring domain that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: Least recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlinks in the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: Most recent date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit the backlinks in the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domains Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of referring domains that contain at least one link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: IPs Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of IP addresses that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Class C Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of referring class C networks that link to the target.

RestConnector.Title: Ref Domains by TLD Type
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the distribution of all TLD types for ref domains

JsonPath.Title: TLD
JsonPath.HelpText: Top-level domain name for which TLD statistics are provided.

JsonPath.Title: TLD Ref Domain Count
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains under the given TLD.

RestConnector.Title: Ref Domains Overview
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains general metrics for ref domains

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domains Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of referring domains that contain at least one link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: IPs Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of IP addresses that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Class C Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of referring class C networks that link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Max Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Maximum number of backlinks that link to the target, among all of the targets.

JsonPath.Title: Max Ref Pages
JsonPath.HelpText: Maximum number of refpages that link to the target, among all of the targets.

JsonPath.Title: All
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Text
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one text backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Image
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one image backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one sitewide backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Not Sitewide
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one not sitewide backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Nofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one nofollow backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Dofollow
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one dofollow backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one redirect backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Canonical
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one canonical backlink to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Gov
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one backlink to the target from a governmental refdomain.

JsonPath.Title: Edu
JsonPath.HelpText: Total amount of referring domains that contain at least one backlink to the target from an educational refdomain.

RestConnector.Title: Ref Domains New/Lost
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains the new or lost referring domains and their details.

JsonPath.HelpText: Date when the Ahrefs crawler was able to visit new or lost backlinks from the referring domain.

JsonPath.HelpText: Indicates whether the backlinks from the referring domain are new or lost.

JsonPath.Title: Ref Domain
JsonPath.HelpText: Referring domain that contains at least one link to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Domain Rating
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain Rating of the referring domain.

RestConnector.Title: Ref Domains New/Lost Counters

JsonPath.Title: New

JsonPath.Title: Lost
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of lost backlinks found from the referring domain.

JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of new backlinks found from the referring domain.

JsonPath.Title: Lost Total
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of lost backlinks found from the referring domain.

RestConnector.Title: Refips
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns the referring IP addresses that have at least one link to the target.

JsonPath.HelpText: The referring IP address that links to the target.

JsonPath.HelpText: The domain name for the referring IP address.

JsonPath.Title: Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of backlinks from the referring IP address with particular domain name.

RestConnector.Title: Subscription Info
RestConnector.HelpText: Contains user subscription information.

JsonPath.Title: Rows Left
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of rows available for making API requests.

JsonPath.Title: Rows Limit
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of rows available for the subscription plan.

JsonPath.Title: Subscription
JsonPath.HelpText: Name of the API subscription plan.
